SEARCH
Package org.hibernate.type.descriptor.jdbc.spi

Class DescriptiveJsonGeneratingVisitor

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.type.descriptor.jdbc.spi.JsonGeneratingVisitor
org.hibernate.type.descriptor.jdbc.spi.DescriptiveJsonGeneratingVisitor
public class DescriptiveJsonGeneratingVisitor extends JsonGeneratingVisitor
Extension of JsonHelper that can be used to generate descriptive JSON output, that is more appropriate for representing complex data structures for displaying purposes.

      protected boolean handleNullOrLazy(Object value, JsonDocumentWriter writer)
      Description copied from class: JsonGeneratingVisitor
      Checks the provided value is either null or a lazy property.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      value - the value to check
      writer - the current JsonDocumentWriter
      Returns:
      true if it was, indicating no further processing of the value is needed, false otherwise.
